ai-tha-ap90:1.1_0: “The Himalayas are falling from the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap90:1.3_0: he speaks Dhamma to the Dhamma.
ai-tha-ap90:2.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap90:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap90:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Mahā Moggallāna.
